caption.p: Analysis of the anti-IAV activity of oseltamivir and itraconazole in combinatory treatments. Polarized Calu-3 monolayers were infected with 0.1 MOI of ( a, c) pdm09 or ( b, d) Panama for 24 h. At 2 h p.i. cells were treated with combinations of oseltamivir and itraconazole at the indicated concentrations for 16 h. Data represent mean percentages Â± SEM of inhibition, with mean virus titer in control cells (treated with the solvent DMSO) set to 100%; n = 3. LogEC 50 values were determined by fitting a non-linear regression model and were compared for shared logEC 50 values.
